block.p: PFIZER, New York, the drug maker, raised its first-quarter dividend by 2 cents, to 19 cents a share.

LUBRIZOL CORP., Cleveland, the maker of additives for lubricants and fuels, said its president and chief executive, James L. Hambrick, would take on the additional title of chairman, succeeding William G. Bares.
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO CO., Winston-Salem,N.C., the cigarette maker, said it would raise list prices on some of its brands and reduce retail discounts on others.
PFIZER, New York, the drug maker, raised its first-quarter dividend by 2 cents, to 19 cents a share.

LUBRIZOL CORP., Cleveland, the maker of additives for lubricants and fuels, said its president and chief executive, James L. Hambrick, would take on the additional title of chairman, succeeding William G. Bares.
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO CO., Winston-Salem,N.C., the cigarette maker, said it would raise list prices on some of its brands and reduce retail discounts on others.
